subject-English: New initiatives, recommendations and supporting business cases are founded from the digital analytics capability.
題目-Chinese: 公司已運用資料分析結果，來規劃創新數位計畫，並支援業務發展。

subject-English: There is mandatory investment budget in place to ensure the business's data analytics capability is continually best in class.
題目-Chinese: 公司已設有年度預算，以提升資料分析能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is viewed as the core capability to revolutionise the business.
題目-Chinese: 資料分析被視為確保業務創新改革的核心能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is used across the whole organisation.
題目-Chinese: 資料分析在公司組織內被廣泛運用。

subject-English: Data analytics resource are empowered to make decisions and drive change off the back of insight.
題目-Chinese: 資料分析人員被充分授權，可根據分析結果進行決策推動。

subject-English: Data analytics resource are multi-disciplined, with a structure in place to effectively support analysis requirements across the whole business.
題目-Chinese: 公司已具備高效能的資料分析人員，並能滿足各項業務的分析需求。

subject-English: There is the ability to carry out analysis to understand the individual lifetime value of their customers.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有預測客戶未來價值(Life Time Value)的能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to optimise online marketing campaigns.
題目-Chinese: 公司已使用資料分析優化線上行銷活動。
